sentences.en: His work is considered the acme of cinematic art.
sentences.cn: 他的作品被认为是电影艺术的巅峰。

sentences.en: He recalls his native Bombay with cinematic exactness.
sentences.cn: 他以电影般的精确回忆了他的故乡孟买。

sentences.en: The actor will soon join the Marvel Cinematic Universe once he begins work on the upcoming superhero flick, Doctor Strange.
sentences.cn: 这个演员很快就会加入漫威电影宇宙，投入其在即将到来的超级英雄影片《奇异博士》的工作。
